description:
* Based on the http://anidb.net/t2805 [4-koma] spin-off manga by http://anidb.net/cr34095 [Akane], serialised in http://anidb.net/cr28845 [Dengeki Maou] since 2011.
Recap: The overly active daily life of http://anidb.net/ch8372 [765Pro]`s idols, http://anidb.net/a8218 [The Idolmasters], becomes even more frantic when the overly cute beings called Puchidolls — somewhat resembling their idols in looks and in character — show up at the studio.
The daily life of The Idolmasters and their Puchidolls continues...

REGULAR.description:
Ritsuko has an April Fools` Day movie pitch for P.
Source: crunchyroll

P`s awkward phone call to the office ends with Yukipo saying her first words.
Source: crunchyroll

On her birthday, Haruka discovers a robot has replaced her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Surprising Way to Say It

REGULAR.description:
Haruka and Makochii come up with a dubious idea for a radio show segment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sound of a Silent Stomach

REGULAR.description:
Yukiho tries to answer some difficult questions from listeners during her radio show.
Source: crunchyroll

Io causes trouble for Iori when she attempts to solve the office`s roach problem.
Source: crunchyroll

Chihaya and Chihyah would very much like to sing some karaoke, but the universe conspires against them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Happiness of Getting to Sing

REGULAR.description:
Hilarity ensues when Koami and Komami start up a staring game in the office.
Source: crunchyroll

When Chicchan and Piyopiyo both come down with a cold, the office staff does their best to keep things running.
Source: crunchyroll

Chibiki, Io, and Yayo make a valiant effort to stay awake while they housesit for Yayoi.
Source: crunchyroll

Ritsuko takes some of the girls on a hot spring trip, but mischief tags along in the form of Takanya, Haruka-san, and Chibiki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Might As Well Try to Relax Now and Then
Tama ni wa Nonbiri Shite Miru ka
たまにはのんびりしてみるか

REGULAR.description:
Even more of the girls end up at the hot spring, but not all of them go there willingly.
Source: crunchyroll

Kotori brings still more of the girls to the hot spring, with the intent of getting some work done.
Source: crunchyroll

As the rest of the office is now at the hot spring, P belatedly tries to join them.
Source: crunchyroll

Makochii is put on an exercise regimen, in an attempt to shed some of the weight she`s gained.
Source: crunchyroll

Yukipo thinks things are going to be different around the office, now that she can speak.
Source: crunchyroll

A warm spring day proves to be a formidable obstacle for anyone in the office who wants to stay awake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 小春日和でぽっかぽか

REGULAR.description:
A day at the office is never dull for Kotori, but unfortunately it`s also never easy.
Source: crunchyroll

Chicchan has her act together and keeps everyone in line, but even she has her weak points.
Source: crunchyroll

A tight budget means this short episode only has time for a game of rock-paper-scissors, courtesy of Yayoi and Yayo.
Source: crunchyroll

Yayo helps Io overcome a fear of water, so she can enjoy a warm footbath.
Source: crunchyroll

When Ritsuko slashes the budget, puchidols have to fill in as staff for Azusa`s photo shoot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はぁときゃっちぐらびあ

REGULAR.description:
Golden Week is starting, but the agency`s work schedule is alarmingly empty, so P sends everyone on a rather unusual island trip.
Source: crunchyroll

Chibiki, Io, Takanya, and Miura-san form a group, and go off in search of the bronze Haruka-san statue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はるかさん像(銅)を目指せ

REGULAR.description:
Makochii, Chihyah, Piyopiyo, Afu, and Haruka-san have to fight their way through a beat `em up game to get to the silver statue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はるかさん像(銀)を目指せ!

REGULAR.description:
Chicchan, Koami, Komami, Yukipo, and Yayo pool their talents and resources together in an effort to obtain the last statue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はるかさん像(金)を目指せ!!

REGULAR.description:
P reveals that the treasure hunt was really a means of training the girls how to utilize a popular TV show technique.
Source: crunchyroll

Yayo and Io act out some short skits to pass the time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: やよいおいまじねいしょん

REGULAR.description:
Yayoi goes out of her way to do something special for Iori`s birthday.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ultra Super Miracle Idol no Tanjoubi
ウルトラスーパーミラクルアイドルの誕生日

REGULAR.description:
Chihaya and Chihyah learn that windy days can mean aerial adventures, for puchidols.
Source: crunchyroll

Koami and Komami learn it`s difficult to play a prank on Piyopiyo, provided she`s awake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぴーっ! ぴぴぴぴぴ

REGULAR.description:
Yukiho tries to save the day on a cooking show, with unforeseen results.
Source: crunchyroll

P takes one for the team when Yukiho insists he eat the strange dish she cooked.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Name Is P! In the Name of Love
Waga Na wa P! Ai no Omomuku Mama ni
我が名はP! 愛の趣くままに

REGULAR.description:
When Chihyah and Yukipo muse about wanting to see a penguin, Miura-san warps them to the South Pole to fulfill their wish.
Source: crunchyroll

Azusa offers some advice when Yukiho shows up at the office dead tired.
Source: crunchyroll

A day in the life of Chihyah shows how she calls many of the shots.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ちひゃーのセレナーデ

REGULAR.description:
Haruka`s efforts to study at the library result in a spontaneous yoga session with Azusa.
Source: crunchyroll

Yayoi puts on glasses, in the hope that it will be enough to help her use a computer to look up bamboo recipes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyou wa Megane no Kibun ka na
Today Feels Like a Glasses Day
今日はメガネの気分かな

REGULAR.description:
Makoto accidentally breaks an expensive pair of glasses while she and Ritsuko are out shopping.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新品メガネはぴっかぴか

REGULAR.description:
Hibiki gets more than she bargained for when she plays a word chain game against three of the puchis.
Source: crunchyroll

Koami and Komami ply their trade by playing pranks on P.
Source: crunchyroll

Ami accompanies Yayo and Io on a jungle treasure hunt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go For the Treasure! Through the Breach

REGULAR.description:
Yukiho`s radio show guest this time is Ami, who is still wearing her costume from the previous episode.
Source: crunchyroll

The puchidols set up an elaborate birthday surprise for Ami and Mami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みっしょんぷちぽっしぶる♡

REGULAR.description:
Kotori and P go out drinking, but no matter where they go, it seems like only puchidols work there.
Source: crunchyroll

Bamboo shoots keep growing out of Yayo`s head, and Takane decides to cook something with them.
Source: crunchyroll

Takane offers a fantastic story to Miki, as an explanation of why Yayo grows bamboo shoots from her head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Once Upon a Time Tale

REGULAR.description:
When Koami and Komami protest having to eat any more bamboo shoots, Takane challenges them to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

Hibiki tries to get Chibiki to stop crying and summoning rampaging animals, but that`s easier said than done.
Source: crunchyroll

Ritsuko, Yukiho, and Takane enlist P as a judge to determine whether their puppet show idea is any good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: いっつ! しょ~たいむ

REGULAR.description:
Yayoi and Haruka experiment on Haruka-san to learn more about how she multiplies.
Source: crunchyroll

During a gig on the usual uninhabited island, Yayoi shows Haruka how to deal with one of Haruka-san`s peculiarities.
Source: crunchyroll

Makochii is overweight again, but the weight loss regimen Makoto puts her on yields mixed results.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ごゆるりだいえっとろぉど

REGULAR.description:
Makochii is overweight yet again, so P steps in and calls on a favor from the "pointy-haired man".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鉄の拳! 緊急すくらんぶる

REGULAR.description:
Afu befriends a snail and brings it to the office, but eventually she has to release it back into the wild.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: あふぅとでんでんむし☆

REGULAR.description:
Ami and Mami compete against Yayoi and Yayo on a fishing contest program.
Source: crunchyroll

The puchidols must attempt to answer the phone, on a day when it`s just them at the office.
Source: crunchyroll

Miki and Yayoi provide some live voice-overs for an exchange between Afu and Yayo.
Source: crunchyroll

Hibiki comes up with a way to deter Afu from stealing rice balls.
Source: crunchyroll

Miki and Yayoi find a book on how to catch puchidols, and decide to try it out.
Source: crunchyroll

Miki`s brain goes on autopilot after a repetitive commercial shoot, so Ritsuko decides to have some mischievous fun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マダゼスチンサイダー! なの

REGULAR.description:
Haruka-san wants to go outside on a rainy day, and when it finally happens, the results are rather unexpected.
Source: crunchyroll

Kotori wins a vacation trip, but when she brings along some of the girls and puchidols, certain plans end up going awry.
Source: crunchyroll

Ami and Mami try to finally win against Takanya in a series of 100 contests.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takanya Dekiru Ko Muteki na Ko
たかにゃデキる子ムテキな子

REGULAR.description:
The end of the month means the budget is tight again, so this time Miki and Afu do the rock-paper-scissors thing.
Source: crunchyroll

Ami, Mami, and Yukiho set up a guessing game for Ritsuko to play on her birthday.
Source: crunchyroll

P sends Ritsuko all around the world to recover the puchidols.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: わぁるど・おぶ・遠足

REGULAR.description:
Iori and Miki follow P around for a day, learning some unexpected things about him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プロデューサーの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Koami and Komami take it upon themselves to fill in for P when he calls in sick.
Source: crunchyroll

P directs some of the idols and puchidols as they rehearse for a very low-budget play.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: This Is the Way It Goes

REGULAR.description:
The girls perform the play in front of a very small audience, and almost nothing goes according to plan.
Source: crunchyroll

Yukipo runs her first errand for the office, with a little help from some friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はじめてのあどべんちゃあ

REGULAR.description:
Ritsuko can`t help but worry about Yukipo, after she sends her on her first office errand.
Source: crunchyroll

The puchidols are asked to perform a mini-concert, with the 765 Pro idols as their backup dancers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぷちます!! プチプチ・アイドルマスター
